title: Ticket #2820: Debian source package for Condor
description: We'd like one, to more easily produce custom builds (like Carsten's repackaging for ulimit wrappers).
remarks:
2012-Mar-08 01:28:03 by mih:
You probably want one with more bells and whistles, but here is a start:

http://packages.debian.org/source/experimental/condor

Needless to mention that contributions towards a more functional, more robust package are more than welcome.
creator: pfc
